description.skill1: Permanently increases the beginning stage after being revived (20f, 40f, 60f, 80f, 100f)

description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Sindbad ]
hidden_abilites: Increases attack speed and movement speed of all friendly soldiers for a short period of time when first appearing, and casts a shield that gives immunity to magic attacks.
Increases basic speed of the game by 7%.
Increases self movement speed and attack distance by 10%.
Increases movements speed and attack distance of all units by 6% and critical damage by 5%.
Increases the damage and critical damage against enemy crystal.
Warcry (Human) Limit Break: Warcry (Human) increases from 30% to 40%.
[Damage Sword] Skill Strengthening: Increases bonus from damage sword in guild invasion. 5% for 5* unit, 10% per 6*. Works from shop of time, goes up to 100%.
Reduces the cooldown of the race change. Reduces the cooldown by 3 minutes for each 5-star unit and 6 minutes for each 6 star unit. Applied from timeshop, and can not exceed 1 hour.

Increases all units' movement speed and critical hit damage by 6%.

Every Flame Spirit's fire resistance increases by 75 and every Senior Flame Spirit's fire resistance increases by 150. Also, the maximum value of resistance against fire from Flame Spirit increases from 2000 to 4000.

When first appearing, helps ally units use skill attacks faster.
Increases the attack speed and attack power of all units by 6%.

Legend of Ancient Forest Awakening: Even if Hippogriff is in Time Shop, Elf's Secret Skill and the Legend of Ancient Forest are applied. Increases by 1% for each 5-star and 2.5% for each 6-star. (However, the increase of Elf's Secret Skill by Hippogriffs cannot exceed 30%, and the increase of the Legend of Ancient Forest cannot exceed 50%.)

buffs.name: Legend of Ancient Forest
buffs.description: [Legend of Ancient Forest] is applied even if Hippogriff is in Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 50%).

hidden_abilites: Increases the basic speed of the game by 4%, and increases the attack range and movement speed by 7%.
When first appearing, increases attack speed and movement speed of ally units for a certain period of time.
Increases attack range, attack power, and critical hit damage of all units by 4%.

The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases more by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5%. (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases 10% -> 12.5%. In addition, when Blade Master is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases 12.5%- > 15%.)

buffs.name: Limit Break of Spirit Rest
buffs.description: The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5% (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases from 10% to 12.5%. In addition, when Blade Master is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases from 12.5% to 15%).

description.skill2: Increase attack speed of orc unit in Guild Raid (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)

Increases movement speed, attack power, and critical hit damage of all units by 4%.
Unlimited dash can be done, and is less affected by knock back, freeze, and blow attack.

The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases more by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5%. (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases 10% -> 12.5%.) In addition, when Dark Spirit is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases to 15%.)

buffs.description: The maximum value of Spirit Rest increases by 2.5%, increasing maximum efficiency up to 12.5% (The maximum efficiency of current Spirit Rest increases from 10% to 12.5%. In addition, when Dark Spirit is awakened, the maximum efficiency increases from 12.5 to 15%).

Increases the attack range and movement speed by 7%, and increases all units' attack power, critical damage, and critical rate by 5%.
Affected less by terrain at stage 10,000 and higher.

When first appearing, the movement speed and attack speed is increased for a certain amount of time, and casts a powerful Valkyrie buff that increases the attack power, movement speed, and attack speed of all nearby units for a certain amount of time.

[Hero Sword] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 5% and every 6 star Valkyrie raises attack power by 10% with [Hero Sword]. (Effective even if Valkyrie is at the Time Shop and can increase up to 100%. [Hero Sword]: Skill that increases ally unit's attack power for a certain amount of time during raid)

description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Incubus ]
hidden_abilites: Increases the attack range and movement speed by 7% and increases all units' attack power, critical damage, and critical rate by 5%.
Affected less by terrain at stage 10,000 and higher.
When first appearing, buff is casted that increases the movement speed and attack speed of nearby units for a certain amount of time, and a shield makes immune against physical attacks.
When casting a skill, becomes invincible, and once skill is cast, HP recovered by 7% and creates shield that absorbs 99% of damage for a certain amount of time.

Raid skill cool-time reduction limit break: Every 5 star Incubus lowers skill cool-time by 0.5% and every 6 star Incubus lowers skill cool-time by 1%. (Effective even if the Incubus is at the Shop and can reduce up to 10%)

Affected less by terrain at stage 10,000 and higher.

The ability to distort space increases, and transports the enemies farther away.

[Fast Shoes] Strengthen skills: Every 5 star Ice Spirit raises movement speed by 5% and every 6 star Ice Spirit raises movement speed by 10% with [Fast Shoes]. Increases movement speed and attack speed of all units by 5%.

description.skill1: Increase attack speed of undead unit in PvP (0.5%, 1%, 1.5%, 2%, 2.5%)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of undead unit in Guild War (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Death Knight ]
hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Quickly moves (dashes) to first target and casts a barrier that defends against 99% of damage for a period of time.
Upon first appearing, casts a magic barrier to protect all the allies from magic attack and restores HP by 10%.
When HP falls under 50%, becomes immune to stun.
Increases ally unit attack power by 10% and movement speed by 5%.

description.skill1: Increase attack power of orc unit in Guild Raid (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of orc unit in Guild War (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Wolf Rider ]
hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases resistance against knock-back by 70% and makes it pushed back less.
Quickly moves (dash) to first attack target, and when attacked by a ranged unit, has a chance to approach it immediately.
Engages in battle quickly.
Raises HP and defense of Orc units by 15%.
